homepage.title: Home
homepage.description: Hello! My name is Esteban. I am an Argentine developer passionate about programming and is looking for challenges.
homepage.education-description: I am a Systems Analyst having studied at the Instituto Politecnico Superior 'Gral. San Martin'.
homepage.skills-description: I master technologies in the .NET environment and seek to specialize more and more. However, I am always open to learning new technologies and looking for ways to do something practical and useful with them.

1.title: BookStore
